title: Market research: Innovative flip-flop.
selftext:
Hello India!

We're crafting a new flip-flop slipper for the Indian market and need your help. Got 5 minutes? Your feedback could influence the comfort of millions of feet. If you're from the footwear industry, we're eager to connect further.

Take our short survey and join us in shaping the future of footwear. Thanks in advance!

https://forms.gle/NZ3rKdCzLpBb7fLf9
